briefdescription.para: initializing the thing needed for the scene
Reset all animations & values to default.
To check the player's input with the correct password.

simplesect.para: Return true if the input match with the correct password, else return false

briefdescription.para: "Press 'C' to interact" will appear if player's position is inside interaction area

detaileddescription.para: return Return true if the player inside interaction area, else false

briefdescription.para: Check whether player's position is inside interaction area.

simplesect.para: Return true if player's position is inside interaction area

briefdescription.para: Display text "Try Again!" if the input does not match with the correct password.

simplesect.para: Return true if input does not match with the correct password, else return false;

briefdescription.para: Check whether player's position is inside interaction area and 'C' button is pressed to open numpad on screen.

detaileddescription.para: return Return true if the player inside interaction area and 'C' button is pressed, else false
